oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Capt. Cyrus DeLany, Co. B, 30th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This post-war photograph shows Civil War veteran, Capt. Cyrus DeLany, Co. B, 30th Ohio Inf. Regt., USA and his siblings taken in California (possibly the Los Angeles area). DeLany joined the regular US Army just after the war in 1867, serving primarily in the 15th Inf. Regt. He ultimately rose to capt. and stayed in the army until his death in 1888.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DeLany, Cyrus M.
